name: plus
effect: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack if any friendly Pokémon has plus or minus. This bonus does not count as a stat modifier. If either ability is disabled by gastro acid, both lose their effect.
short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
